sn38.4:1.1: “Kimatthiyaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti?
sn38.4:1.2: “Dukkhassa kho, āvuso, pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti.
sn38.4:1.3: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.4:1.4: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.4:1.5: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.4:2.1: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.4:2.3: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā etassa dukkhassa pariññāyā”ti.
sn38.4:2.4: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etassa dukkhassa pariññāya.
